data.comment: Manuel Mota starts the match. Tondela with the kick-off in Tondela.
Tondela to take a throw-in in Moreirense territory.
In the minute 2, Ball safe as Moreirense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Manuel Mota awards the home team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Moreirense.
In the minute 5, Tondela awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Manuel Mota awards Tondela a goal kick.
In the minute 7, Moreirense have been awarded a corner by Manuel Mota.
Throw-in for Tondela in the half of Moreirense.
Tondela have been awarded a corner by Manuel Mota.
In the minute 10, Tondela surge into the attack at Estadio Joao Cardoso but Abdel Jalilâ€™s header is off-target.
Moreirense have a goal kick.
Manuel Mota signals a free kick to Tondela in their own half.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Moreirense at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
Can Tondela get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Moreirense's half?
Moreirense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Tondela in their own half.
Free kick for Moreirense in their own half.
Moreirense are coming forward and Felipe Pires gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 17, It's a goal kick for the home team in Tondela.
The home team have replaced Mario Gonzalez with Souleymane Anne. This is the first substitution made today by Pako Ayestaran.
In Tondela a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 19, Tondela awarded a free kick in their own half.
Manuel Mota signals a Tondela throw-in in Moreirense's half.
Throw-in high up the field for Tondela in Tondela.
In the minute 21, Manuel Mota signals a free kick to Moreirense in their own half.
Cesar Peixoto (Moreirense) is making a first substitution, with Nahuel Ferraresi replacing Steven Vitoria.
Free kick for Moreirense in their own half.
In the minute 24, Moreirense awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Moreirense.
In the minute 26, Can Tondela get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Moreirense's half?
Moreirense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal kick for Moreirense at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
In the minute 28, Manuel Mota signals a Moreirense throw-in in Tondela's half.
Pedro Augusto (Tondela) gets booked by Manuel Mota, and will miss the next match due to the number of yellow cards received this season.
Tondela needs to be cautious. Moreirense have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 32, Fabio Pacheco (Moreirense) has received a yellow card from Manuel Mota.
Salvador Agra for Tondela drives towards goal at Estadio Joao Cardoso. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Tondela are pushing forward but Abdel Jalil's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 33, Ball goes out of play for a Moreirense goal kick.
Manuel Mota signals a free kick to Moreirense.
Bebeto is booked for the home team.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Moreirense at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
Manuel Mota awards Tondela a goal kick.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Afonso Figueiredo for Moreirense who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 39, Free kick for Moreirense in their own half.
Moreirense drive upfield and Derik Lacerda gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Tondela defender.
Corner awarded to Moreirense.
In the minute 40, Afonso Figueiredo returns to the field for Moreirense after picking up a slight injury.
Corner awarded to Moreirense.
The away team has substituted Afonso Figueiredo with Walterson. Cesar Peixoto is thus making his second change.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Moreirense in their own half.
Throw-in for Tondela in the half of Moreirense.
Tondela to take a throw-in in Moreirense territory.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Moreirense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Manuel Mota will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Rafael Barbosa (Tondela) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 45, Free kick Tondela.
Throw-in for Tondela in the half of Moreirense.
Manuel Mota signals a free kick to Moreirense in their own half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Tondela in the half of Moreirense.
Throw-in Moreirense.
Manuel Mota signals a throw-in for Tondela, close to Moreirense's area.
In the minute 45, Manuel Mota awards the away team a throw-in.
Goal kick for Moreirense at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
The first-half has come to a close in Tondela.
In the minute 46, Moreirense have kicked-off the second half at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Moreirense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 46, Moreirense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Manuel Mota signals a Tondela throw-in in Moreirense's half.
Derik Lacerda of Moreirense gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 48, Ball goes out of play for a Tondela goal kick.
Tondela to take a throw-in in Moreirense territory.
Manuel Mota signals a free kick to Moreirense in their own half.
In the minute 50, In Tondela Moreirense's Derik Lacerda is caught offside.
Yan gets his shot on target but fails to score for Moreirense.
He's off! Joao Pedro is shown a red card.
In the minute 59, Tondela awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Moreirense in their own half.
Manuel Mota awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 64, Filipe Soares (Moreirense) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Moreirense have been awarded a corner by Manuel Mota.
Can Tondela get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Moreirense's half?
In the minute 65, Tondela make their second substitution with Jaume Grau replacing Souleymane Anne.
Pako Ayestaran is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Joao Cardoso with Mohamed Naoufel Khacef replacing Abdel Jalil.
Throw-in for Tondela in their own half.
In the minute 68, Moreirense's Alex Soares has been booked in Tondela.
Manuel Mota signals a free kick to Moreirense.
Felipe Pires for the away team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 72, Important block from the Tondela defence as Felipe Pires fires in a strike for Moreirense.
Throw-in Tondela.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 75, In Tondela Moreirense drive forward through Derik Lacerda. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Moreirense to take a throw-in in Tondela territory.
The away team replace Fabio Pacheco with David Tavares.
In the minute 75, Goncalo Franco is replacing Alex Soares for Moreirense at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
Pako Ayestaran (Tondela) is making a fourth substitution, with Tiago replacing Bebeto.
Tondela's Rafael Barbosa misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 77, Moreirense have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Tondela at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
Manuel Mota signals a Moreirense throw-in in Tondela's half.
In the minute 80, Can Moreirense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tondela's half?
Yan (Moreirense) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tondela.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Tondela in their own half.
Free kick for Tondela in their own half.
Goal kick for Moreirense at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Tondela at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
Moreirense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jaume Grau for Tondela has been booked by Manuel Mota and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 85, Corner awarded to Moreirense.
Manuel Mota signals a free kick to Tondela in their own half.
In the minute 86, Moreirense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Enzo Martinez (Tondela) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in for Tondela in the half of Moreirense.
Manuel Mota awards Moreirense a goal kick.
In the minute 88, Can Moreirense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tondela's half?
Goncalo Franco (Moreirense) gets a yellow card.
Free kick for Moreirense in their own half.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Can Moreirense capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Tondela's half?
Moreirense advance rapidly upfield but Manuel Mota blows for offside.
Throw-in for Moreirense in the half of Tondela.
Manuel Mota signals a free kick to Moreirense in their own half.
Ball safe as Tondela is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Moreirense close to the penalty box.
Moreirense have a dangerous throw-in.
That's full-time at Estadio Joao Cardoso. The final score is 0-0.
